I’m a creative from Australia. I’m driven by curiosity. And fear, and money, and a love of expensive cheeses… but mainly I’m driven by curiosity…

I’ve got 10+ years of experience and I do it all because I’m actually fascinated by how people tick. I want to know how everything thing works. Why something’s funnier in Finland than in France. Why some people love sudoku while others share cat videos.

I’m fascinated by how modern tools, platforms and technologies influence the relationship between people, places and products. It’s amazing to see all of this stuff being redefined every day.

I’m at my best when I can develop ideas without prejudice. I can write. I can art direct. I can design. I can teach. I can present. I can start all kinds of sentences in the first person singular form… But deep down I’m a digital dilatant.

I work best in teams that let me contribute beyond the job title on my email signature. And besides, ideas tell you how and where they want to live. I’ve developed and executed campaigns across almost all traditional and digital channels.

When I’m not working hard for my clients I enjoy cross-country shopping, deep-sea reading, downhill mountain painting, long-distance sculpture, and gravy training.

You can learn more about what I’ve d
one, and where I’ve done it, on LinkedIn.

If you like what you see you should contact me.

//A 🙈 🙉 🙊
